availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Craig. Father of William Craig, Elizabeth Craig, Martha Craig, John Craig, Sophia Craig, and Julia Craig. Merchant in Lincoln County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 4. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 1. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 8. Find A Grave, "J.N. Craig (1813-1899)," Memorial #99991686, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/99991686 (accessed November 29, 2018).
